title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 67.1 - Importation prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 67.1 - Importation prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall transport or bring into this State any
equine, bovine, porcine, caprine, ovine, cervidae or llama from a point of
origin located within 10 miles of any place in which the disease vesicular
stomatitis has been found to exist during the 30-day period prior to the entry
of said animal into this State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
67.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
